email_response.subject: Re: OPPORTUNITY: Satellite Upgrade technicians needed in Atlanta
email_response.body:
Thanks for the email.

I appreciate you reaching out, but I don't think I'm the right fit for this project.

I primarily do ground-level cable installation work - I have a cable tester and ladder but no bucket truck or spectrum analyzer. I'm also not really interested in traveling much at this point.

If you have any local ground-level work in the future, feel free to reach out.

Thanks anyway,
Robert Williams
